title: 1.7.10mod服崩溃
author: Marst...
txt_content:
本帖最后由 Marst... 于 2018-7-19 22:06 编辑 

以下是崩溃日志---- Minecraft Crash Report ----// You're mean.


Time: 7/19/18 5:31 PM
Description: Exception in server tick loop


cpw.mods.fml.common.LoaderException: java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: net/minecraft/client/multiplayer/WorldClient

replies.author: 十年后？
replies.txt_content: 服务端带有 类似“小地图”之类的MOD 请删掉就能开服了

replies.author: God_SF
replies.txt_content:
把主MOD除外的一些MOD删除
比如：NEI。小地图。背包编辑器。等等

replies.author: 南瓜.
replies.txt_content: 你敢用KC服务端开mod服？你还嫌不够卡吗

replies.author: ksqeib445
replies.txt_content: 请看末尾那段，把UE后面的mod全部删除
